goal.ch: 1. 使學生了解數位時代中新媒體發展概況及相關的基本概念2. 建立數位行銷概念與行銷傳播溝通模式3. 瞭解在數位產業成功經營與數位行銷傳播模式4. 現代青年對數位行銷傳播的鑑賞能力5. 增進數位行銷的素養,與跨科際整合能力及輔助未來相關就業之6. 傳播理論發展脈絡介紹"
goal.en: "1. Enable students to understand the digital age and new media development overview of basic concepts related.2. Establishment of digital marketing concepts and marketing communications mode of communication.3. Learn to operate successfully in the digital industry and digital marketing communications mode.4. Appreciation of modern youth spread of digital marketing.5. Promotion of digital literacy marketing, and interdisciplinary integration capabilities and supporting the future of inter-related employment of preparation.6. Introduce Communication theory"

outline.ch: 1. 新舊媒體的分野、認識數位匯流2. 全球數位行銷趨勢與發展3. 數位消費行為的變化4. 數位溝通與社群經營5. 自媒體時代的品牌經營與改變6. SoLoMo的行銷策略與案例分析7.破擊假訊息的數位素養
outline.en: "1. The dividing line between old and new media, understanding Digital convergence.2. Global digital marketing trends and developments.3. Several changes in consumer behavior.4. Digital communication and community management.5. Since the era of brand management and media change6. SoLoMo marketing strategies and case studies"
